verses.verse: Then <S%H935>came<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, even the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, into the <S%H4057>desert<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3427>abode<s%> in <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%>; and <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> there, and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> there.
And there was no <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>: and they <S%H6950>gathered<s%> themselves together against <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and against <S%H175>Aaron<s%>.

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7378>chode<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, and <S%H559>spake<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Would God <S%H3863>that<s%> we had <S%H1478>died<s%> when our <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H1478>died<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>!
And why have ye brought <S%H935>up<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> into this <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, that we and our <S%H1165>cattle<s%> should <S%H4191>die<s%> there?

And wherefore have ye made us to come <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to <S%H935>bring<s%> us in unto this <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>? it is no <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H2233>seed<s%>, or of <S%H8384>figs<s%>, or of <S%H1612>vines<s%>, or of <S%H7416>pomegranates<s%>; neither is there any <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> unto the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon their <S%H6440>faces<s%>: and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> unto them.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H3947>Take<s%> the <S%H4294>rod<s%>, and <S%H6950>gather<s%> thou the <S%H5712>assembly<s%> together, thou, and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%>, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> ye unto the <S%H5553>rock<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>; and it shall give <S%H5414>forth<s%> his <S%H4325>water<s%>, and thou shalt bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> to them <S%H4325>water<s%> out of the <S%H5553>rock<s%>: so thou shalt <S%H8248>give<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> and their <S%H1165>beasts<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%>.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4294>rod<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, as he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6950>gathered<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> together <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5553>rock<s%>, and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> now, ye <S%H4784>rebels<s%>; must we <S%H3318>fetch<s%> you <S%H4325>water<s%> out of this <S%H5553>rock<s%>?

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and with his <S%H4294>rod<s%> he <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H5553>rock<s%> <S%H6471>twice<s%>: and the <S%H4325>water<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7227>abundantly<s%>, and the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H8354>drank<s%>, and their <S%H1165>beasts<s%> also.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, Because ye <S%H539>believed<s%> me not, to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> me in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, therefore ye shall not <S%H935>bring<s%> this <S%H6951>congregation<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> them.

This is <S%H1992><s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H4809>Meribah<s%>; because the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7378>strove<s%> with the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and he was <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in them. Meribah: that is, Strife

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> from <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> thy <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, Thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> all the <S%H8513>travail<s%> that hath <S%H4672>befallen<s%> us: befallen: Heb. found us

How our <S%H1>fathers<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and we have <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%>; and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7489>vexed<s%> us, and our <S%H1>fathers<s%>:

And when we <S%H6817>cried<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, he <S%H8085>heard<s%> our <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> an <S%H4397>angel<s%>, and hath brought us <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: and, behold, we are in <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%>, a <S%H5892>city<s%> in the <S%H7097>uttermost<s%> of thy <S%H1366>border<s%>:

Let us <S%H5674>pass<s%>, I pray thee, through thy <S%H776>country<s%>: we will not <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H7704>fields<s%>, or through the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>, neither will we <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H875>wells<s%>: we will <S%H3212>go<s%> by the <S%H4428>king's<s%> high <S%H1870>way<s%>, we will not <S%H5186>turn<s%> to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> nor to the <S%H8040>left<s%>, until we have <S%H5674>passed<s%> thy <S%H1366>borders<s%>.
And <S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Thou shalt not <S%H5674>pass<s%> by me, lest I come <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> thee with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, We will <S%H5927>go<s%> by the high <S%H4546>way<s%>: and if I and my <S%H4735>cattle<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> of thy <S%H4325>water<s%>, then I will <S%H5414>pay<s%> <S%H4377><s%> for it: I will only, without doing any <S%H1697>thing<s%> else, go <S%H5674>through<s%> on my <S%H7272>feet<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Thou shalt not go <S%H5674>through<s%>. And <S%H123>Edom<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> him with <S%H3515>much<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, and with a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

Thus <S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5674>passage<s%> through his <S%H1366>border<s%>: wherefore <S%H3478>Israel<s%> turned <S%H5186>away<s%> from him.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, even the whole <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> unto <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%>, by the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> unto his <S%H5971>people<s%>: for he shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, because ye rebelled <S%H4784>against<s%> my <S%H6310>word<s%> at the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H4809>Meribah<s%>. word: Heb. mouth
<S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, and bring them <S%H5927>up<s%> unto <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%>:

And <S%H6584>strip<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> of his <S%H899>garments<s%>, and <S%H3847>put<s%> them upon <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>: and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> unto his people, and shall <S%H4191>die<s%> there.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%>: and they went <S%H5927>up<s%> into <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6584>stripped<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> of his <S%H899>garments<s%>, and <S%H3847>put<s%> them upon <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>; and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> there in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mount<s%>: and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mount<s%>.

And when all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H175>Aaron<s%> was <S%H1478>dead<s%>, they <S%H1058>mourned<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>, even all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
